divs: Sighting Detailsthis thing has een in the nights sky for a few nights. the pther report in atlanta last night is probably the same thing im reporting. it is huge and shines likea star and moves slowly in the sk. i set up a camera and the object was above the tree line. over time is slowly had moved back and forth abover the trees. it is huge and so bright,. i zoomed in ad got a close up it was emmitting a blueish yellow and sometimes green light. if i look at it with the plain eye is almost5 flickers. i star gaze all the time and tis is niot a star. i looked at stars these past tweo nights and they have no characteristics that this thing has. not to long ago i saw a huge triangular shaped craft others speak of floating over thr highway. it seemed like a floating city s was so huge.i havwe video of this object if anyone is interested im sure its the same thing the other atlanta report was speaking of.
